name: Apeirophobia
description:
Try to survive each day and find a bed to sleep in.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

E - Interact

F - Inventory

Shift - Sprint (toggle)

C - Crouch

Space - Jump

Q - Equip

Mouse Left - Attack

Mouse Right - More options in Inventory

All the art assets were obtained either on the unreal marketplace or other on-line sources as listed in this document: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1pORI2_Z5piBCSs_Qz_gXZRSlgpUwF5DEnn_ZeqMAouk
